title: Cucumber Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 thick slices of wholemeal bread', '2 tablespoons cream cheese, softened', '6 slices cucumber', '2 tablespoons alfalfa sprouts', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon red wine vinegar', '1 tomato, sliced', '1 leaf lettuce', '1 pepperoncini, sliced', '1/2 avocado, mashed']
